thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com | 12 of 657
thread.title: KB

author: KB
title: KB
text:
I looked around for prices on contacts. they are a commodity product, so why not look for the best price? despite contact lens resellers trying to generally confuse the process of price comparison by posting low low prices, but then adding on significant 'handling' charges... grrrr... it is frustrating.
But I found Frames Direct to be much more straightforward and clear. And their customer service was fantastic (esp Dianna B). Though I would like to have received a tracking number directly and automatically, I reached out through customer service and received one the very next day. Thanks!
